issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Once we have made all the updates for APS 1.1, we should fold back this version of the SDK into titanium_mobile to reduce the number of different active branches in the APS repository.

It would be greatly preferred if in the Titanium SDK build script we referred to a tagged build of the APS SDK and pulled in that version as opposed to checking in artifacts.
fields.summary: Incorporate APS SDK 1.1 into Titanium Mobile 5.0.0
